title: FS Beautiful Johnson Hands at Chest PSA 5 Polar Bear REDUCED

posts.post_title: FS Beautiful Johnson Hands at Chest PSA 5 Polar Bear REDUCED
posts.post_content: I have this really nice Walter Johnson Hands at Chest for sale. Graded PSA 5 with great centering and sharp corners. Has a Polar Bear back also. $1660 shipped. Paypal gift or money order is fine. Thanks for looking. I would also consider trades for mid tier Hall Of Famers in PSA 3,4 or 5. Examples, Baker, Chance both portraits, Evers Port and Cubs jersey, Tinker Bat on, Port and Hands on knees, Joss Port, Bender Port, Chesbro, Walsh etc etc. No lower tier Hallers ,wanted.
